profile:
Bayside Blinds and Shutters, a division of Brooklin Blinds and Shutters Inc., is a new business in the Quinte West area. We recently moved to this area from the Durham Region, and have already had the privilege of working in some beautiful homes in Trenton, Quinte West and Belleville.

We offer a variety of custom window coverings from the Shadeomatic collection but specialize in Eclipse/Shadeomatic Shutters which offer a 25-year warranty on their California shutters. Ask us about products that are energy efficient, easy to maintain, and are fire retardant.

We have won the Homestars "Best Of" Award in the blinds and shutters category (Durham Region) in 2013, 2014, 2016, 2017, 2018, 2019 and 2020, and pride ourselves on our customer care and satisfaction.

Please consider us when purchasing window coverings for your home. We give free estimates and can offer great pricing due to low overhead costs. A quote can even be given right over the phone (window width X length needed).

We look forward to serving you!

Mark and Crystalyn Tessier

 (905) 925-3826 | baysideblindsandshutters@gmail.com
service_area: Brooklin, Whitby, Oshawa, Ajax, Bowmanville, Clarington, Durham Region
